fields.name: break_speed_wood
fields.description: How fast the axe mines per second. Caps out at 60 per second.
fields.warning: Don't go crazy with this, please. Even 20 is overkill.

fields.name: break_power_wood
fields.description: Used for both how much damage the axe does to a tree, and what kinds of trees it can mine. Most trees have a toughness of 0, but some special late game trees are tougher to avoid progression skips. Keep that in mind!
fields.info: The formula is damage = break_power / tree_toughness - 1. If the result is negative, no damage is dealt.
